#Load libraries and data

```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)

col_specifications<-('ffffffcdfff') #compact string to specify column types

dat<-readr::read_csv(file=paste0(here::here(), 
                              "/data/ECHO_data_summarized_maximum_values.csv"), 
                     
                     col_types = col_specifications)

          
```
